s: Other brands have been found to contain the occasional piece of glass. I originally ordered 1lb of this soap and it lasted me about 6 months, I just placed my second order and got 5lbs. When cut up the 5lbs made 32 bars of soap, and incredible value for a great soap. It does feel a little gritty, that is because it is made from all natural ...

s: This soap has a surprisingly good lather for a natural product, you can use it anywhere from head to toe, it's great for sensitive skin, it's not terribly drying and leaves your face nice and soft. It has a gentle soap smell also, though when I first unwrapped it it smelled terrible.
